SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.img_url, t1.unit, t1.description, t3.NAME categoryName, t4.NAME brandName, t1.status FROM pms_spu t1 LEFT JOIN pms_category t3 ON t1.category_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN pms_brand t4 ON t1.brand_id = t4.id
AND t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t1.name like concat('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%')
AND t1.category_id =#{queryParams.categoryId}
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

SELECT t1.id, t1.`name`, min(t2.price) price, t1.img_url, sum(t2.sales) sales, t1.description, t1.unit FROM `pms_spu` t1 LEFT JOIN pms_sku t2 ON t1.id = t2.spu_id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN pms_spu_comment t3 ON t1.id = t3.spu_id AND t3.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.`status` = 1 AND t1.is_deleted = 0
AND ( t1.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') OR t1.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') )
AND category_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.categoryId},'%')
GROUP BY t1.id
ORDER BY
min(t2.price) sum( t2.sales ) (sum(t2.sales) * 0.5 + sum(t3.star)/COUNT(t3.id) * 0.5) t1.create_time
ASC DESC
